document.full_text: tibetan exiles elected a harvard law scholar as their political leader, who is likely to bring in a more radical government-in-exile to challenge china after the dalai lama moved to relinquish his political role.
document.title: exiled tibetans elect political heir to dalai lama
lines_and_colors: tibetan exiles elected a harvard law scholar as their political leader, who is likely to bring in a more radical government-in-exile to challenge china after the dalai lama moved to relinquish his political role.
